评论详情: These were so sturdy, and so nice! They looked beautiful, and were perfect for what I needed! They are such a good price for what they are! I highly recommend!

Got this to package my jewelry for customers that like all kinds of styles and I really like it they are so well made and beautifully crafted, the color is a must to bring out the beauty and quality of my pieces. they come many as well.

My wife has a side business where she ships out jewelry so I have tried a number of boxes and these drawer style boxes are probably my favorite from a price to value perspective. They have a high quality look and feel, with a black velvet lined foam interior and little pull tabs to open. The felt also has pre-cut slits for helping secure jewelry like earrings.  My pack arrived fine, previously I have had issues with dented corners as they are only made with cardboard but these arrived in great shape. The price point is pretty solid, not the cheapest of this style that I have seen but competitive. Their color selection is also very impressive, with some colors I have never seen offered before.
